user_description: Your voice was the soundtrack of my summer.
The Chogalink's Diaries are to be going on..
chronicling things that happen in my personal life
The dream was always running ahead of me. To catch up, to live for a moment in unison with it, that was the miracle.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
I am unique, so there must be something I can do better than anyone else. Iâ€™m sure about that.
If someone can get me through,it's you
